title: Executive Order 8485-Authorizing the Appointment of Peres D. Ziegler to a Position as Rural Letter Carrier Without Regard to the Requirements of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the provisions of paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 403, 404), it is hereby ordered that Peres D. Ziegler may be appointed to a position as rural letter carrier in the Postal Service without compliance with the requirements of the Civil Service Rules.
Mr. Ziegler is a former member of the crew of the U.S.S. Panay and was injured in line of duty in the bombing and sinking of that vessel.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8485-Authorizing the Appointment of Peres D.
